The video footage was published on Faceb: 2021, and has been viewed more than 8,000 times.
The Indonesian: language post translates to English as "THEY ARE SCREAMING, CALLING THE LORD'S NAME..." and includes hashtags related to the Sriwijaya Air plane crash.
The claim is related to the Sriwijaya Ai: which crashed into the Java Sea on January 9, 2021, shortly after takeoff from Jakarta.
The original footage was posted on Insta: 2018, and was later misused in 2018 with false claims about the Lion Air Flight JT 610 accident.
